line_1: Through tiresome mediums we at truth arrive;

line_2: Hoydens and Romps, led on by Gen'ral CLIVE.

line_1: And when to those blest Mansions I arrive,
line_2: With pity I'll behold those that survive.

line_1: IF ere the moment should arrive,
So, Royal Mandates, the last Hour arrive,
line_2: When pitying Queens bid Malefactures live;

line_1: He thought he never shou'd arrive;
Now to new Worlds we steer, and quickly shall Arrive:
line_2: Our Spirits shall Mount as fast as our dull Corpses Dive

line_1: Shou'd such a wretch to num'rous years arrive,
line_2: It can be little worth his while to live;

line_1: On Thames's bank the stranger shall arrive,
line_2: Thy sacred grott shall with thy name survive.
